conversation.message:
That is an excellent question and demonstrates forward-thinking planning. Ensuring a smooth transition to elementary school is a core component of our curriculum. We implement a specific 'Bridge Program' in the final year, focusing not only on advanced literacy and numeracy skills but also on crucial executive functioning abilities like organizational skills, time management for short tasks, and independent problem-solving. We also host annual 'Meet the Teacher' events with several local primary schools to familiarize the children with the subsequent educational environment. We see this preparatory work as vital to setting our students up for sustained academic success.

Given the rapid pace of allocations, we strongly encourage you to formalize your application soon if you wish to benefit from these programs, as we are prioritizing families who are ready to commit.
